for_sales.sales_text: G.R.P. yacht construction design by Eric Bergqvist circa 1990.  The yacht has been sailed extensively on the Broads and around the UK .  With her distinct livery she is a beautiful boat complete with all rig, mast, broom, gaff and tan sails registered WB58.   All the equipment is in very good condition with main spares all in spruce.  Interior is 2/4 berth.  It has fully cushioned units and is very comfortable.   The yacht comes with a 4 hp outboard motor more than enough power in my experience. The yacht sits and travels on a bespoke galvanised two wheeled braked trailer also in fine condition and included in the sale. Also included in the sale is a rare first edition "The Winkle Brig Book" by Martin Cartwright which gives you all the information you require to perfect your skills with this amazing style of yacht. Currently winter stored under cover near Carsington Water in Derbyshire.  Can be seen at the club from March 2024.
